issue.title: [Python] Address docstrings for Tensor class
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16059](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16059). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ensure all docstrings of Tensor class, the functions and the constructor have an `Examples` section:

<https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.Tensor.html#pyarrow.Tensor>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16059?focusedCommentId=17521600) by Alessandro Molina (amol-):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12779
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12779>
